{{Infobox Radio station |image =| |name = ABC West Coast SA| |callsign = 5LN | |coordinates = {{Coord|34|43|11.61|S|135|51|26.08|E|type:landmark_scale:2000_region:AU}} |airdate = 1987 | |frequency = 1485 [[kilohertz|kHz]] [[amplitude modulation|AM]] (Eyre Peninsula)
693 [[kilohertz|kHz]] [[amplitude modulation|AM]] (West Coast)| |area = [[Eyre Peninsula]] | |owner = [[Australian Broadcasting Corporation]] | |format = [[Talk radio|Talk]] | |website = [http://www.abc.net.au/eyre/ http://www.abc.net.au/eyre/ ] | }} '''1485 ABC Eyre Peninsula & West Coast''' to give it its full name, is an [[ABC Local Radio]] station based in [[Port Lincoln, South Australia]]. The station broadcasts to the [[Eyre Peninsula]] and western coastal region of [[South Australia]], including the towns of [[Tumby Bay, South Australia|Tumby Bay]], [[Cummins, South Australia|Cummins]], [[Ceduna, South Australia|Ceduna]] and [[Streaky Bay, South Australia|Streaky Bay]]. The station began broadcasting as '''5LN''' in 1987. There is a second transmitter (callsign 5SY) at Streaky Bay for the west coast region. It is one of the smallest ABC local radio stations with a staff of just 4. ==Local Programs== ===Weekdays=== *Breakfast with Lisa Leong â 6:30 AM to 7:45 AM & 8:30 AM to 9:00 AM When local programs are not broadcast the station is a relay of [[891 ABC Adelaide]] or [[ABC North and West SA]]. ==References== {{cite web |title=The History of ABC West Coast SA |url=http://www.abc.net.au/local/stories/2008/02/18/2165211.htm|date=2008-03-18 |accessdate=2008-04-15 |publisher=[[ABC Online]] }} ==See also== * [[List of Australian radio stations]] {{ABC Local Radio}} [[Category:Radio stations in South Australia]] {{DEFAULTSORT:Abc West Coast Sa}}
